meanings.definition: A person or thing that makes something certain.
meanings.sent1: The weather forecast was the certainer of our picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: The certainer of the team's victory was their star player.
meanings.sent3: The magic eight ball was the certainer of all answers at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her confident smile was the certainer of her success in the interview.
meanings.sent5: The lock on the door was the certainer that kept the house safe.
